channel.title: Blogs on Ganesh's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Ganesh's Blog

item.title: Zero Day
item.description: This has been a long time comming. For someone who likes to read so much I have been procrastinating for too many years to get started with writing. So hear it is. What do I want to write? Mostly technology. I work in DevOps and would like to start writing about what I learn and work on. But more than that I want to write about the stuff I like reading.
